name: THE
description:
Your world has gone white, the only color worth protecting is that of the Red Fire,  The Blue Water and The Green Tree. Gamers are so used  to multi tasking and moving and looking and shooting at the same time, in THE, you can only do one thing at a time, you can look around but not move, and you can move around but not look. Protect the color from faders, dark souls that will vaporize any existing color from your world.

Side Note: This is my very first Game Jam and I want to thank all of you for being such an AWESOME COMMUNITY.  Any feedback  is good feedback. Hope you guys enjoy the game.

GMTK Game Jam 2019!!!!!
